kpi_info.title: Data missing if value 1
kpi_info.use: This line appears in the ASCII report if a fault happened during the data collecting. It means that the printed authentication counters are not reliable. (The problem can be: some of the VLRUs don't work, overloaded situation). In XML report the allowed value for this counter is '1' and is sent only in case when 'DATA MISSING IN TRANSFERRED VECTOR COUNTERS' line appears in ASCII report.
